Message.Title: gop are idiots for scolding skinny dipping congressman
Message.Msg: ( they SHOULD have been ashamed of the junket to Israel and all the sucking up and war mongering they do) Republican Congressman Scolded After Drinking and Nudity in Israel A group of House Republicans visiting Israel as part of an official Congressional delegation last summer enjoyed a late night of drinking at the Sea of Galilee that included swimming and, in the case of one member, a little skinny dipping in the place where the Bible says Jesus walked on water. The story was first reported by Politico and has been confirmed by ABC News. House Majority Leader Eric Cantor was on the trip but was not present for the late night antics. When Cantor was told about what happened, according to Republican sources, he was "livid" and called members of the delegation to say the behavior was unacceptable and must never be repeated. The skinny dipper, according to the sources, was Rep. Kevin Yoder, R-Kansas.

Topic.Title: we were better off in the Clinton years

Message.Msg: yeah, those were the good old days... Greenspan lowered interest rates and Bill lowered taxes, pushed de-regulation (real estate loans and repeal of Glass Stegall) and globalization. Then, when the economy was firing on all cylinders he raised taxes to pay off the national debt after being lambasted by Ross Perot to do so. Times were great until the dot com disaster in Clinton's last year ended 20 years of prosperity. And then 9/11 happened in retaliation for Clinton's drone bombing of bin Laden's compound. We've been trying to recover for the last 10 years.

Topic.Title: we were better off in the Clinton years

Message.Msg: Let's go back to the expenditures of Clinton's final year in office. Now add for each year an increase to match inflation and then use that as our nations spending cap. Deficit goes away. There is no reason we need to be spending 2x the amount at the end of 2011 that we did in 2000.
